name: Octopush (bogemic)
description:
This octopus likes money very much (huh, who does not?) and keeps looking for the gold coins even in the dark.

Help little octopus to collect coins and gems hidden deep in the ocean.

Solve all the puzzles and earn three stars on each level.

The coins are created by pushing and dropping colored gems into rows of three, just like in other match-3 puzzle games.

Collect all the coins to earn maximum score!
